connection.title: Connect Your Device
connection.subtitle: Let's connect your Nebu toy to get started
connection.start_scan_hint: Tap "Start Scan" to search for your Nebu device
connection.enable_bluetooth_message: Please enable Bluetooth to connect to your Nebu device.
connection.bluetooth_required: Bluetooth is required to scan for devices
connection.skip_dialog_message:
You can set up your Nebu device later from the home screen.

Are you sure you want to skip the setup now?
connection.permissions_required_message: Bluetooth and location permissions are required to connect to your device. Please enable them in settings.
connection.setup_options_desc: Choose how you want to proceed
connection.configure_locally_desc: Set up child info without a device
connection.skip_setup_desc: Continue to home and set up later
connection.make_sure_on: Make sure your Nebu is turned on
connection.permissions_denied_desc: Bluetooth and location permissions are needed to find your device.

wifi.title: Connect to Wi-Fi
wifi.subtitle: Enter the Wi-Fi credentials for the network you want your Nebu device to connect to.
wifi.validation_ssid_too_long: Wi-Fi name must be 32 characters or less
wifi.validation_password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters
wifi.validation_password_too_long: Password must be 63 characters or less
wifi.credentials_sent: Credentials sent! Waiting for your device to connect...
wifi.status_connecting: Your device is connecting to WiFi...
wifi.status_failed: Connection failed. Please check your WiFi credentials and try again.
wifi.error_ble_disconnected: Lost connection to your device. Please reconnect and try again.
wifi.error_ble_timeout: Your device is not responding. Please try again or restart it.
wifi.timeout_dialog_message: Your device is taking longer than usual to connect to WiFi. You can wait or continue and configure WiFi later.
wifi.cancel_dialog_message: Your device is still trying to connect to WiFi. Are you sure you want to cancel?
wifi.error_status_stream: Error connecting to your device. Please try again.
wifi.scan_not_supported: WiFi scanning is not available on this device
wifi.hotspot_hint: If you're using your phone's hotspot, type the network name manually — it won't appear in the scan.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.public_profile_desc: Allow other users to view your profile
privacy.share_activity_desc: Help us improve by sharing usage data

privacy.download_started: Download of your data has started
privacy.delete_account_description: Request deletion of your account and associated data.
privacy.link_error: Could not open the link. Please try again.
privacy.delete_account_desc: Permanently delete your account and all data
privacy.delete_account_warning: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
privacy.consequence_1: You will lose access to all your toys
privacy.consequence_2: All your activities will be deleted
privacy.consequence_4: You won't be able to recover your data
privacy.incorrect_confirmation: Incorrect text. You must type DELETE exactly

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.introduction_content: Welcome to {0}. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.
privacy_policy.collect_content: We collect information that you provide directly to us:
privacy_policy.collect_1: Personal information (name, email address, phone number)
privacy_policy.collect_4: Toy interaction data and activity logs
privacy_policy.use_content: We use the information we collect to:
privacy_policy.use_1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
privacy_policy.use_2: Personalize your experience with your toys
privacy_policy.use_3: Communicate with you about updates and features
privacy_policy.use_4: Ensure the security of our services
privacy_policy.sharing_content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with service providers who assist us in operating our application, conducting our business, or servicing you, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.
privacy_policy.children_content: Our service is designed for use by children with parental consent and supervision. We comply with COPPA (Children's Online Privacy Protection Act) and take special measures to protect children's privacy. Parents can review, modify, or delete their child's information at any time.
privacy_policy.rights_1: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
privacy_policy.rights_3: Request deletion of your personal data
privacy_policy.rights_4: Object to or restrict certain processing of your data
privacy_policy.delete_content: You can request deletion of your account and associated data at any time.
privacy_policy.security_content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy_policy.changes_content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
privacy_policy.contact_content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction_content: Welcome to {0}. These Terms of Service govern your use of our mobile application and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
terms.acceptance_content: By creating an account or using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, you must not use our services.
terms.use_content: You agree to use our service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to:
terms.use_1: Use the service in any way that violates applicable laws or regulations
terms.use_2: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
terms.use_3: Interfere with or disrupt the service or servers
terms.use_4: Use the service for any harmful or malicious purposes
terms.account_content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
terms.prohibited_content: When using our service, you must not:
terms.prohibited_1: Upload or transmit viruses, malware, or any malicious code
terms.prohibited_2: Harass, abuse, or harm other users
terms.prohibited_4: Collect or store personal data of other users without permission
terms.prohibited_5: Use the service for commercial purposes without authorization
terms.ip_content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Nebu AI and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
terms.user_content_content: You retain ownership of any content you submit to the service. By submitting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, and distribute your content in connection with the service.
terms.termination_content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms.
terms.delete_content: You may request deletion of your account and associated data at any time. Deletion requests are processed according to our Privacy Policy.
terms.disclaimers_content: The service is provided "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not warrant that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.
terms.liability_content: In no event shall Nebu AI be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use the service.
terms.changes_content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of significant changes. Your continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
terms.law_content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Nebu AI operates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
terms.contact_content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:
